short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provide faster web to achieve better speed for people in regions with slow connection to public knowledge of science and technology.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This package provides safe and verified web proxies and sets up the Chrome proxy settings. It may be useful for people who work with limited internet connection to public knowledge websites such as wikipedia, etc. With the provided proxies, users could access web content faster. This package is meant to legal usage only. By using the package, users are encouraged to work in scientific research for better future of human.

To use the package, users need to register with a valid email address. Then a secret token will be created. Afterwards with a small amount of payment, users could access web via the provided proxy. A switch is provided for user to enable or disable the proxy.
